snippet: Law enforcement officials worldwide are coordinating efforts against Anonymous.
abstract: Law enforcement officials worldwide are coordinating efforts to rein in the leaderless, multinational hacker movement Anonymous; former leader Sabu, also known as Hector Xavier Monsegur, turned informant and named suspects; his downfall is seen as sowing even more distrust and dissension in the ranks of Anonymous.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Nicole Perlroth, Steven Yaccino, Alex Vadukul and Tim Stelloh.

lead_paragraph: Law enforcement officials worldwide are coordinating efforts against Anonymous.

headline.main: Arrests Sow Mistrust Inside a Clan of Hackers
headline.print_headline: Arrests Sow Mistrust Inside a Clan of Hackers
